summary: REAR COIL SPRINGS ARE CRACKED - BOTH SIDES.  VEHICLE ONLY 5 YEARS OLD.  USED IN PRIMARILY IN CITY, RUNNING ERRANDS - FOR RETIRED COUPLE.  ALSO:  LEFT OUTER TIE ROD END IS WORN OUT AND HAS TO BE REPLACED.  THIS CAUSES A VIBRATION AT HIGHWAY SPEEDS AND ALSO RATTLES WHEN GOING OVER SMALL BUMPS (<1") AT LOW SPEEDS (<10 MPH).  *JB
